name: Fire in time
description:
Help Flammy lighting up the campfires in this hot-headed quest. Hurry! The fire won't burn for too long without his touch.

  • Hold left mouse button and release it to create a wall. Bouncing on a wall increases Flammy's speed.
  • Press spacebar (or double click - or double tap, on mobile) to empower Flammy, incresing his size for a short duration.
  • Everytime Flammy exits the screen will slow down.

There shouldn't be many bugs, hopefully :)
